name: PatentWorld Data Dictionary
description: Schema reference for all JSON data files served by PatentWorld. Data derived from USPTO PatentsView bulk download (February 2026).

source_tables.g_patent: Core patent records (patent_id, patent_date, patent_type, num_claims)
source_tables.g_location_disambiguated: Geographic locations (state, city, country, latitude, longitude)

data_directories.chapter1: Patent counts by year and type, grant lag trends
data_directories.chapter2: Quality metrics: claims, citations, scope, originality, generality
data_directories.chapter3: Top assignee rankings and concentration ratios
data_directories.chapter4: CPC section distribution, field dynamics, class-level changes
data_directories.chapter5: Technology convergence: cross-section patents, convergence pairs
data_directories.chapter7: Domestic vs. foreign assignee composition by country
data_directories.chapter8: Inventor segments: top inventors, productivity distribution
data_directories.chapter10: Firm quality: citations, blockbuster rates, sleeping beauties
data_directories.chapter11: Corporate portfolio diversity, competitive proximity, JSD
data_directories.chapter12: NLP topic modeling: 25 topics from 8.45M patent abstracts
data_directories.chapter13: Patent law timeline: 21 legislative and judicial events
data_directories.chapter14: Generalist vs. specialist inventors, CPC breadth
data_directories.chapter16: Gender trends in patenting, quality by gender
data_directories.chapter17: Team size trends and quality metrics by team size
data_directories.chapter19: International inventor geography and quality by country
data_directories.chapter22: International co-invention trends and bilateral flows
data_directories.company: Company-level profiles, firm quality, design patents, mortality
data_directories.act6: Cross-domain comparison: volume, growth, quality, spillover
data_directories.green: Green innovation / climate technology domain analysis

derived_metrics.originality: 1 - HHI of backward citation CPC sections. Range 0 to ~1.
derived_metrics.generality: 1 - HHI of forward citation CPC sections. Range 0 to ~1.
derived_metrics.blockbuster_rate: Share of patents in top 1% of 5-year forward citations within grant-year × CPC section cohort.
derived_metrics.dud_rate: Share of patents with zero 5-year forward citations.
derived_metrics.shannon_entropy: H = -Σ pᵢ log(pᵢ). Log₂ for topic modeling, ln for portfolio diversity.
derived_metrics.hhi: Σ sᵢ² × 10,000. Concentration index (0 = fragmented, 10,000 = monopoly).
derived_metrics.cr4: Combined patent share of top 4 organizations in a domain.
derived_metrics.exploration_score: Share of patents in CPC classes new to the firm in the prior 5 years.
derived_metrics.grant_lag: Days between application filing date and grant date.
derived_metrics.cohort_normalization: Patent citations divided by mean citations in same grant-year × CPC section.
